verses.name: Acts 24:5
verses.text: For we have found this man a pestilent fellow, and a mover of sedition among all the Jews throughout the world, and a ringleader of the sect of the Nazarenes:

verses.name: Acts 24:6
verses.text: Who also hath gone about to profane the temple: whom we took, and would have judged according to our law.

verses.name: Acts 24:7
verses.text: But the chief captain Lysias came upon us, and with great violence took him away out of our hands,

verses.name: Acts 24:8
verses.text: Commanding his accusers to come unto thee: by examining of whom thyself mayest take knowledge of all these things, whereof we accuse him.
